definitions.definition: to know the meaning of something that someone says:
examples: She explained the whole idea again, but I still didn't understand.

definitions.definition: to know why or how something happens or works:
examples: [ + question word ] We still don't fully understand how the brain works.

definitions.definition: to know how someone feels or why someone behaves in a particular way:
to think, especially wrongly, that someone means a particular thing:
examples: When he said three o'clock, I understood him to mean in the afternoon.

definitions.definition: When two people understand one another, they both know what the other means and wants and they have an agreement:
examples: I wanted to make sure that we want the same things, that we really understand each other.
